title: I don't know why people are up in arms about Ziggs and Malzahar bot lane
body: I mean, Mages being bot lane isnt anything {{champion:63}} new.

replies.body: Funny thing is my brothers were calling mages getting brought bot before it ever became a thing.
Mages have always been coming bot, usually along with the jungler for a 4-man dive at 6 minutes.

me and my friend used to do brand and malzahar bot back in like season 5. good times.

and to a lesser extent Sejuani and Gragas, fuckin body slams everywhere.
You forgot {{champion:161}}

> [{quoted}](name=JayHog1992,realm=EUW,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=G6IbFwch,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2017-01-14T21:12:10.119+0000)
>
> You forgot {{champion:161}}

i am completely fine with everyone forgetting about him. that way he doesnt get nerfed.
Yes, but even we who play him have to admit that his true damage is outrageous...

> [{quoted}](name=DeusVult,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=G6IbFwch,comment-id=000200020000,timestamp=2017-01-15T02:16:59.524+0000)
>
> Yes, but even we who play him have to admit that his true damage is outrageous...

shhhhhh. we know nothing.
Truly truly outrageous
Especially at botlane where carries are very squishy.
I take Kat bot, and rek him.

actually, the smaller the sample size, the more skewed the results, AKA  :  {{champion:4}} , {{champion:50}}  ,  {{champion:82}}  , {{champion:34}} , {{champion:43}}  , {{champion:63}} 

and that's close to it given the rapid nerfs they were handing out
Or played, fortunately

Guess they weren't very knowledged in the subject.

*rimshot*
Vel koz he forgot about him...

Less funny when you consider Morgana is the original mid to go bot lane, with others to follow, some already mentioned: Zyra, Velkoz, Brand, etc. 

Good try though. 

Personally i've nothing against the trend except not all teams understand that the physical damage needs to be made up elsewhere on the map. Additionally too many players unused to one or both champions end up under performing if not outright feeding.  Malzahar is not a newcomer to support. He's been tried on and off since the mid season mage update. Wasn't succeeding well, and still not seeing it do much at the elo i'm in.

I think the reason he put {{champion:63}} there was because it makes the sentence

"I mean, Mages being bot isn't anything brand ({{champion:63}}) new."

> [{quoted}](name=Votable Jester,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=G6IbFwch,comment-id=00040003,timestamp=2017-01-15T01:03:40.399+0000)
>
> I think the reason he put {{champion:63}} there was because it makes the sentence
> 
> "I mean, Mages being bot isn't anything brand ({{champion:63}}) new."

True, but eh. Guess I wasn't feeling very punny today. It happens occasionally.
Wasn't Annie the original? I thought Morgana was (initially, anyway) the counterpick to Annie support.

> [{quoted}](name=5000000000000000,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=G6IbFwch,comment-id=00040002,timestamp=2017-01-15T00:27:25.749+0000)
>
> Wasn't Annie the original? I thought Morgana was (initially, anyway) the counterpick to Annie support.

Good question. Unless Annie was brought bot lane as early as season 2/3 like Morgana was, i'd have to say no. I can't recall Annie down there, at least not regularly until later on.
I thought Annie was a bot laner in season 1 when marksmen went mid and Annie-Blitz wombo was a thing
Not sure season one really counted since they weren't really supports back then, it was basically just a kill lane comprised of two kill champions, often bruisers.

Morg has been down there with decent regularity since the game came out, not just Season 2/3. She has a very utility-oriented kit, after all, and she was made when they made champions in more of a DotA manner where they didn't just declare where a champion was going to go or what they'd be best at and that was that - Ashe went mid in the same time period so she could acquire levels to get her ult faster for initiations and disengages all over the map and more levels for more ranks in her Q for higher kill threat in a less mobile game, like a Drow Ranger putting early points into her Frost Arrows and Gust over Precision Aura after the value skill point.
Morgana is a support...
I'm not saying she's not. I'm saying that (I thought) Morgana was brought into spotlight as a counterpick to Annie support. Not entirely sure if that's true, though.
thats sort of because morgana is a support... look at her champ screen XD

> [{quoted}](name=darkcastkiller,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=G6IbFwch,comment-id=00040004,timestamp=2017-01-15T19:40:13.925+0000)
>
> thats sort of because morgana is a support... look at her champ screen XD

At the start of League she was a mid. She just was a secondary support. She transitioned more toward botlane as the seasons went on, but she's seen quite frequently mid in higher elos still.

(Also if you're going to respond to multiple posts, quoting helps because some of us still use the true traditional posting board format instead of the lazy, reddit style one. :P)
Buddy, this is the memes and games section.....
http://www.davidtucker.me/content/paint-it-black/12-salt-shaker/davidtucker-saltshaker-04.jpg

How exactly is he salty? He just stated it's less funny to him because of Morgana (very calmly) and then constated simple fact about physdmg and magdmg output balance still required regardless of what class is botlaning. So?

{{champion:1}} {{champion:99}} {{champion:143}} {{champion:63}} {{champion:45}} {{champion:161}}bot is nothing new, and to some extent {{champion:34}}

Edit: I forgot to add {{champion:25}}
The question (as he mentoined Ziggs) - are we talking Botcarry or Support?

> [{quoted}](name=Nostormo,realm=EUNE,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=G6IbFwch,comment-id=00070000,timestamp=2017-01-14T23:43:47.342+0000)
>
> The question (as he mentoined Ziggs) - are we talking Botcarry or Support?

Mage "Supports" are the new bot lane carries IMO
lol, riot even originally listed anivia as a mage/support or was it support/mage?

"BUT THAT'S A SUPPORT!!!"

{{champion:63}} THIS {{item:3089}} IS {{item:3151}} NOT {{item:3041}} A {{item:3020}} SUPPORT {{item:3116}} BUILD {{item:3285}}
{{champion:63}} "But then how will I do damage and carry my garbage team?!?"
trade mejais or boots, your choice.
Replace boots with a second ludens.
{{champion:1}}  I am the original "support"
No this is fine haha. Nothing wrong with it.
I was going to whip out a gameplay link but I realized if I did, I would be {{champion:63}} ed as a guy who replies seriously to a memes and games post.
{{sticker:zombie-nunu-tears}} mfw people don't see the pun

I agree entirely. Though I will add, is it only due to meta that bot lane is supposed to be ADC/Supp? I had a game with a friend (this was back in S5, but it would likely still work now) where we played Diana/Sion bot. We stomped the enemy team ridiculously hard. We 2v5d them in their base. Why? It's unexpected, and there is little an unprepared bot lane (or team) can do to stop something like that. Playing the meta holds the game back more than anything imo.
http://i.imgur.com/bofUVay.gif?noredirect
I don't personally have an issue with botlane Ziggs, as much as I have an issue with Ziggs himself. Fuck that champion. He may not be OP or anything, but god do I hate playing against him.
we all love the mines in the bush trick XD
I've been playing kat bot for 3 years.
Malzahar is just cheese with his ult. Anyone decent at bot lane shouldn't really have much trouble with him. Just be ready for that flash ult cheese
BOOTYU
mages being bot are fine, I have issues with ziggs damage to turrets and turrets being pansy little things as it is...
